#summary model(name)
#labels api,0.9

*Category*:

[GlobalFunctions Global Functions]

*Description*:

Returns a reference to the requested model so that class level methods can be called on it.

*Return Type*:

Any

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

|| *Name* || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *name* || string || true || - || Name of the model (class name) to get a reference to ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset authorObject = model("author").findByKey(1)>
}}}

*Related*:

 * ObjectRelationalMapping (chapter)
